name: CKNotification.NotificationType
desc: Constants that indicate the type of event that generates the push notification.

items.name: case query
items.desc: A notification that CloudKit generates from a query subscriptionâ€™s predicate.

items.name: case database
items.desc: A notification that CloudKit generates when the contents of a database change.

items.name: case recordZone
items.desc: A notification that CloudKit generates when the contents of a record zone change.

items.name: case readNotification
items.desc: A notification that your app marks as read.
